abstracts.cdata!:
The Request for Inspection of the
            Cameroon Petroleum Development and Pipeline Project outlines
            problems caused to the indigenous communities that border
            the pipeline area, as detailed by the Center for the
            Environment and Development (CED).  The request details
            several claims to the destruction of natural resources as a
            result of the pipeline construction, including the
            dissemination of medicinal plants and the scarcity of game.
            The request also claims that the indigenous communities were
            not informed properly during the pipeline's planning
            stages and there has been a lack of respect and compensation
            for workers in the area while construction is taking place.
